item.title: 'Duck Dynasty' star's new controversy
item.description:
Phil Robertson has "got a radical idea" on how to deal with the controversial transgender bathroom bill in North Carolina.

Sponsored:
Drivers Will Be Furious When This Finally Happens
If you drive less than 50 miles a day, this new rule will shock you.
item.ExtractedText: 1 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – The Duck Commander crew works on transforming their warehouse into a "scarehouse" during a Halloween episode. Holding the chainsaw is Si Robertson, who founded the company along with his brother Phil, not pictured. Hide Caption 2 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – Phil Robertson cuts meat during a recent "Duck Dynasty" episode. He was suspended by A&E in December 2013 after he made controversial remarks about gays and blacks in an interview with GQ magazine. Hide Caption 3 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – Willie Robertson, one of Phil's sons, does yoga with his wife, Korie, to get ready for their high school reunion. Willie does much of the narrating on the show. Hide Caption 4 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – The Robertsons watch as Sadie Robertson, Willie and Korie's daughter, walks in a New York fashion show in September 2013. Hide Caption 5 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – Willie attends the Academy of Country Music Awards in April 2013. Hide Caption 6 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – Jep Robertson, one of Willie's brothers and Phil's sons, is pushed along by Duck Commander employee Justin Martin. Hide Caption 7 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – Willie and Si guest-star in the season premiere of the ABC show "Last Man Standing" in 2013. Hide Caption 8 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – Jase, Si and Willie throw out the ceremonial first pitch before a Major League Baseball game in Detroit in September 2013. Hide Caption 9 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – In a "Duck Dynasty" episode where the office air conditioning broke, Si tries to beat the heat by creating a pool in the back of his pickup truck. Hide Caption 10 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – Si, Jase and Willie appear on "Late Night With Jimmy Fallon." Hide Caption 11 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – Si, appearing on the show as an angry elf, tells children they're not going to get the gifts they ask for. He told one young girl, who asked for art supplies, that there's no money in being an artist. Hide Caption 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – Phil, Si and Jase go dove hunting. Hide Caption 13 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – Si takes one of his daily naps, surrounded by some Robertson family trophies. Hide Caption 14 of 15 15 photos: The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' The stars of 'Duck Dynasty' – Phil takes his place at the head of the table. A family dinner is the typical scene that ends each episode. Hide Caption
